titles.title: A bill to suspend the Panama Canal Treaties until such time as General Manuel Noriega and his associates similiarly involved in the drug trafficking relinquish political or military control over Panama.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 6/29/1988--Introduced. Suspends U.S. obligations under the Panama Canal Treaties until such time as General Manuel Noriega and his associates similarly involved in drug trafficking relinquish political and military control over Panama.
